members.leaveCircumstances: Robin announces her departure to Sanji and Chopper, confirming she will not return to the crew and claiming responsibility for attacking Iceburg.

keyMoments.title: Nico Robin Leaves the Straw Hat Pirates
keyMoments.description: Robin officially announces her departure from the Straw Hat Pirates, telling Sanji and Chopper she won't be returning and taking responsibility for the attack on Iceburg.
keyMoments.significance: A devastating moment for the crew that sets up the entire Enies Lobby arc and tests the bonds between the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: The Crew Commits to Finding the Truth About Robin
keyMoments.description: After hearing about Robin's confession and departure, the Straw Hats decide they must determine whether Robin is truly friend or foe rather than accepting her departure at face value.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's loyalty and unwillingness to abandon a crewmate without understanding the full truth.
